title: Reform Mayor Candidate Attends Anti-ULEZ Protest Run by ‘Climate Lockdown’ Conspiracy Theory Group
description:
The Reform UK candidate for London mayor has been accused of ignoring science after joining a rally organised by conspiracy theorists who say green policies are a plot to impose “climate lockdowns”.   Howard Cox, director of the FairFuelUK lobby group against charges on motorists, attended Saturday’s protest in Trafalgar Square against London’s ultra-low emission zone […]

The post Reform Mayor Candidate Attends Anti-ULEZ Protest Run by ‘Climate Lockdown’ Conspiracy Theory Group appeared first on DeSmog.
